messages.subject: Re: Unschoolers and  college
messages.msgSnippet: Ren.. Hello!!  Oh wow.. I don t even know if Laurie s old page is still up. It was through the college. She has a new site and we have a new one for the book.
messages.messageBody:
Ren.. Hello!! Oh wow.. I don't even know if Laurie's old page is
still up. It was through the college. She has a new site and we have
a new one for the book. They're linked to each other. Our old
interview is still there under Media. There's a place at the bottom
where you can sign up to get updates on the book and our publishing
company, Unbounded Publications. Nothing on it yet, but I'll be
putting a message on there this week.

http://geocities.com/theunprocessedchild/

love, Valerie

> Good! Having you here will make it easier on me Valerie, lol (I
give
> everyone the link to Laurie's page whenever the college topic rolls
around)
> Better to get the info. straight from the source.
> It's inspirational for those of us just broaching the teen years.
>
> Ren

messages.subject: Unschoolers and  college
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/12/02 7:41:50 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/12/02 7:41:50 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Anyway, I've written a book about her life and it goes to the
printers in a month, so will hopefully be in the stores by Xmas.
Hopefully I'll drop in here more often.
>>

Good! Having you here will make it easier on me Valerie, lol (I give
everyone the link to Laurie's page whenever the college topic rolls around)
Better to get the info. straight from the source.
It's inspirational for those of us just broaching the teen years.

Ren
